scripts.next: npm run build && npm set registry http://verdaccio.61info.com && npm version prerelease --preid=next && npm publish --tag=next && git push
scripts.patch: npm run build && npm set registry http://verdaccio.61info.com && npm version patch && npm publish && git push
scripts.minor: npm run build && npm set registry http://verdaccio.61info.com && npm version minor && npm publish && git push
scripts.major: npm run build && npm set registry http://verdaccio.61info.com && npm version major && npm publish && git push
